Title: Aimeos denial of service vulnerability in SaaS and marketplace setups
Description: All SaaS and marketplace setups using Aimeos version from 2022/2023/2024 are affected by a potential denial of service attack
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2024.04.1 before 2024.04.7, all versions starting from 2023.04.1 before 2023.10.17, all versions starting from 2022.04.1 before 2022.10.17
NotImpacted: All versions before 2024.04.1, all versions starting from 2024.04.7 before 2023.04.1, all versions starting from 2023.10.17 before 2022.04.1, all versions starting from 2022.10.17
